page.title: 18SUPERNATURAL (CONT)
page.content:
THE BLACK HOUND
As well as [REDACTED] and Upp Hall there is another haunting which involves everybody in the area even though they may not realise it. It involves a black hound which roams the streets day or night. Some people may have seen it without knowing what they are seeing. The only proof that there is a phantom hound roaming the streets of this area is that at least one person has seen it walk through a garden wall. Legend has it that this dog belonged to the local gamekeeper but was shot after the gamekeeper was killed in an accident.
